General.Name: Chant Sincere Co Ltd
General.Description: Chant Sincere Co., Ltd. engages in the design, manufacture, and sale of connectors and cables in Taiwan and internationally. The company's principal products include I/O, board to board, waterproof, industrial, and automotive connectors; memory card connectors and adaptors; high-speed connectors and cables; and audio and video connectors and cables. Its products are used in various industries, such as computing, industrial and automation, telecommunication, automotive, waterproof, consumer, and medical industries. The company was founded in 1985 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 188, Datong Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 221
